item.title: [LATEX] BFA 本/硕毕业论文|课程论文模版 BFA Thesis Template (latex)
item.description: * 反馈请提issue 或 邮件juneleungchan@163.com * 仅作参考，随时更新 * 支持平台：windows, mac * 主文档入口：MainPaper.tex <!DOCTYPE html> 本科毕业论文模版 Undergraduate Thesis Template in Latex <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/BFA_Undergraduate_Thesis_Template <!DOCTYPE html> 硕士毕业论文模版 Master Thesis Template in Latex <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/BFA_Master_Thesis_Template <!DOCTYPE html> 研究生课程论文模版 Course Paper Template in Latex <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/BFA_MasterCourse_Paper_Template @juneleung 20230801

item.title: [Python] 电影数据库爬虫 Web crawler for Movie Database
item.description: * 目标：电影数据库建设 * Goal: movie database construction * 任务：根据电影信息，如电影名，查找对应的豆瓣和IMDB网页 * Task: find the corresponding Douban and IMDB web pages according to the movie information, such as the movie name * 语言：Python * Language: Python <!DOCTYPE html> Github: https://github.com/juneleung/bsDoubIMDB <!DOCTYPE html> Code # -*- coding: utf-8 -*- from __future__ import print_function from selenium import webdriver import time from bs4 import BeautifulSoup import requests import re filmlist = ["阿丽塔：战斗天使","不可能的事","地狱男爵：血皇后崛起","复仇者联盟4：终局之战","大侦探皮卡丘","蝙蝠侠：缄默","火箭人","哥斯拉2：怪兽之王","爱宠大机密2","疾速追杀3","蝙蝠侠大战忍者神龟","阿拉丁","魔童","黑衣人：全球追缉","X战警：黑凤凰","优步危机","夏福特","安娜","昨日奇迹","狮子王","玩具总动员4"] targetUrls = [] driver = webdriver.
